name: Dyna Bros
description:
Dyna Bros is a local & online multiplayer game where you blow up your twin brother with dynamite!

Have a blast!

Changelog:

1.3: Removed auto-quit in local mode, added ONLINE MULTIPLAYER!
1.2: Added gamepad support & auto quality adjustment for weaker systems
1.1: Balancing of dynamite range
1.0: First release

A game submitted for the Duplicade Jam.
